interactions.description: a request for projects in XML

providerStates.name: i have a list of projects

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
        <projects>
        <item>
        <id>1</id>
        <tasks>
            <item>
                <id>1</id>
                <name>Do the laundry</name>
                <done>true</done>
            </item>
            <item>
                <id>2</id>
                <name>Do the dishes</name>
                <done>false</done>
            </item>
            <item>
                <id>3</id>
                <name>Do the backyard</name>
                <done>false</done>
            </item>
            <item>
                <id>4</id>
                <name>Do nothing</name>
                <done>false</done>
            </item>
        </tasks>
        </item>
        </projects>
